name: The Stalker Game Review
description:
Welcome to the retro-future!

The Stalker Game Review is a games magazine text written by a very active player and by published games designer Krisse Tuominen. This exact text, in this form, has been produced for the Reviewjam 2023. #reviewjam forever! :-)

If the product feels like, at least, a bit, like a found document about the game that never was, it is because... *We are experiencing some difficulties in transmission, come back later, we will duly fix the bug*
